
Description

address.opal is a network that interprets addresses. The fields recognized are cities, states, countries, and postcodes.
This component includes static files for common world cities, US states, and countries. Five digit US postcodes are also
interpreted. 


Integration Notes

This .opal file also reads cities, states, and countries from the files CitiesSync.txt, statesSync.txt, and CountriesSync.txt.
These files can be updated with information obtained as part of data live synchronization, prior to the .opal file being 
loaded.

Known Issues


Custom Agents
